jira_based_request.description: Generate test cases from a JIRA issue

manual_input_request.description: Generate test cases from manual input

manual_input.title: User Registration Feature
manual_input.description: Allow new users to register for an account with email verification
acceptance_criteria: User can enter email, password, and confirm password
System validates email format
Password must meet complexity requirements (8+ chars, uppercase, lowercase, number)
Confirmation email is sent to user's email address
User can click verification link to activate account
Account is marked as active after verification

simple_request.description: Simple test case generation with defaults

manual_input.title: Shopping Cart - Add Item
manual_input.description: Users can add products to their shopping cart
acceptance_criteria: User clicks 'Add to Cart' button on product page
Item is added to cart with correct quantity
Cart icon shows updated item count
Success message is displayed

manual_input.title: REST API - Get User Profile
manual_input.description: API endpoint to retrieve user profile information
acceptance_criteria: GET /api/users/{id} returns user profile
Response includes user id, name, email, and creation date
Returns 200 status code for valid user
Returns 404 for non-existent user
Requires authentication token in header

manual_input.title: E-commerce Checkout Flow
manual_input.description: Complete purchase flow from cart to order confirmation
acceptance_criteria: User can review items in cart
User enters shipping address
User selects shipping method
User enters payment information
Order is processed and confirmation is shown
Confirmation email is sent
